person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Every year , 500 new plastic surgeons graduate in Brazil and medical students from all over the world come to study there .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| 500 new plastic surgeons |
| medical students |

In the given paragraph, the two "Person" entities are "500 new plastic surgeons" and "medical students". These entities are people who are directly mentioned or implied in the context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| 500 new plastic surgeons |
| medical students |

In the given paragraph, the two "Person" entities are "500 new plastic surgeons" and "medical students". These entities are people who are directly mentioned in the context. The other entities, such as "there" and "world", do not refer to specific people and are therefore not included in the table.
